item.text: In the third year of King Belshazzar’s reign, a vision appeared to me, Daniel, after the one that had appeared to me previously.

In this<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07200 02377">vision</st> I <st data-num="01961 07200">saw</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> in <st data-num="07800" class="">Susa</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="01002" class="">citadel</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is located in the <st data-num="04082" class="">province</st> of <st data-num="05867" class="">Elam</st>. In the <st data-num="02377" class="">vision</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="0589 01961">myself</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="0195" class="">Ulai</st> <st data-num="0180" class="">Canal</st>.<n id="4" />

I <st data-num="05869" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">up</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07200 02009">saw</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0259" class="">a</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> with two <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="0180" class="">canal</st>. Its two <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> were both <st data-num="01364" class="">long</st>,<n id="4" /> but <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> was <st data-num="01364" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="08145" class="">other</st>. The <st data-num="01364" class="">longer one</st> was <st data-num="05927" class="">coming up</st> <st data-num="0314" class="">after</st> the shorter one.

I saw that the ram was butting westward, northward, and southward. No animal was able to stand before it, and there was none who could deliver from its power. It did as it pleased and acted arrogantly.
While I was contemplating all this, a male goat was coming from the west over the surface of all the land without touching the ground. This goat had a conspicuous horn between its eyes.

It <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01167 07161">two-horned</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I had <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">beside</st> the <st data-num="0180" class="">canal</st> and <st data-num="07323" class="">rushed</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> it with <st data-num="02534" class="">raging</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st>.<n id="1" />

I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> it <st data-num="05060 0681"> approaching</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st>. It <st data-num="04843" class="">went into a fit of rage</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the ram<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05221" class="">struck</st> <st data-num="0352" class="">it</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07665" class="">broke off</st> its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st>. The <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">ability</st> to <st data-num="05975 06440">resist</st> it.<n id="3" /> The goat <st data-num="07993" class="">hurled</st> the ram<n id="4" /> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st> and <st data-num="07429" class="">trampled</st> it. <st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> one <st data-num="01961" class="">could</st> <st data-num="05337" class="">deliver</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> from its <st data-num="03027" class="">power</st>.<n id="5" />

The male goat acted even more arrogantly. But no sooner had the large horn become strong than it was broken, and there arose four conspicuous horns in its place, extending toward the four winds of the sky.
From one of them came a small horn, but it grew to be very great toward the south and the east and toward the beautiful land.

It <st data-num="01431" class="">grew</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">so great it reached</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="08064" class="">heaven</st>, and it <st data-num="05307" class="">brought about the fall</st> of <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st> and <st data-num="04480" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="03556" class="">stars</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>, where it <st data-num="07429" class="">trampled</st> them.

It also <st data-num="01431" class="">acted arrogantly</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">Prince</st> of the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> whom<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08548" class="">daily sacrifice</st> was <st data-num="07311" class="">removed</st> and whose <st data-num="04349 04720">sanctuary</st><n id="3" /> was <st data-num="07993" class="">thrown down</st>.
The army was given over, along with the daily sacrifice, in the course of his sinful rebellion. It hurled truth to the ground and enjoyed success.

Then I heard a holy one speaking. Another holy one said to the one who was speaking, “To what period of time does the vision pertain—this vision concerning the daily sacrifice and the destructive act of rebellion and the giving over of both the sanctuary and army to be trampled?”
He said to me, “To 2,300 evenings and mornings; then the sanctuary will be put right again.”
While I, Daniel, was watching the vision, I sought to understand it. Now one who appeared to be a man was standing before me.

Then I <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">voice</st> coming from <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the banks of the <st data-num="0195" class="">Ulai</st>. It <st data-num="07121 0559">called out</st>, “<st data-num="01403" class="">Gabriel</st>,<n id="1" /> enable <st data-num="01975" class="">this person</st> to <st data-num="0995" class="">understand</st> the <st data-num="04758" class="">vision</st>.”

So he <st data-num="0935" class="">approached</st> the <st data-num="0681" class="">place where</st> I was <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st>. As he <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st>, I <st data-num="01204" class="">felt terrified</st> and <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">flat on the ground</st>.<n id="1" /> Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, “<st data-num="0995" class="">Understand</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="02377" class="">vision</st> pertains to the <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> of the <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st>.”
As he spoke with me, I fell into a trance with my face to the ground. But he touched me and stood me upright.
Then he said, “I am going to inform you about what will happen in the latter time of wrath, for the vision pertains to the appointed time of the end.

The <st data-num="0352" class="">ram</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="01167" class="">with</st> the two <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> stands for the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="04074" class="">Media</st> and <st data-num="06539" class="">Persia</st>.

The <st data-num="06842 08163">male goat</st><n id="1" /> is the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="03120" class="">Greece</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> <st data-num="07161 0834">horn</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> its <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>.

The horn that was <st data-num="07665" class="">broken</st><n id="1" /> and in whose <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st> there <st data-num="05975" class="">arose</st> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> others stands for <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="04438" class="">kingdoms</st> that will <st data-num="05975" class="">arise</st> from his <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st>, though they will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> have his <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st>.

Toward the <st data-num="0319" class="">end</st> of their <st data-num="04438" class="">rule</st>, when <st data-num="06586" class="">rebellious acts</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08552" class="">are complete</st>, a <st data-num="05794 06440">rash</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0995 02420">deceitful</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> will <st data-num="05975" class="">arise</st>.<n id="4" />

His <st data-num="03581" class="">power</st> will <st data-num="06105" class="">be great</st>, but it will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be by his <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> alone. He will <st data-num="07843" class="">cause</st> <st data-num="06381" class="">terrible</st> <st data-num="07843" class="">destruction</st>.<n id="1" /> He will <st data-num="06743" class="">be successful</st> in what he <st data-num="06213" class="">undertakes</st>.<n id="2" /> He will <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="06099" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> and the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="06918" class="">holy ones</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="05921" class="">By</st> his <st data-num="07922" class="">treachery</st><n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="06743 03027">succeed</st> through <st data-num="04820" class="">deceit</st>.<n id="2" /> He will <st data-num="01431" class="">have</st> an <st data-num="01431" class="">arrogant</st> <st data-num="03824" class="">attitude</st>,<n id="3" /> and he will <st data-num="07843" class="">destroy</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> who are <st data-num="07962" class="">unaware</st> of his schemes.<n id="4" /> He will <st data-num="05975" class="">rise up</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">Prince</st> of <st data-num="08269" class="">princes</st>, yet he will be <st data-num="07665" class="">broken apart</st>—but <st data-num="0657" class="">not</st> by human <st data-num="03027" class="">agency</st>.<n id="5" />
The vision of the evenings and mornings that was told to you is correct. But you should seal up the vision, for it refers to a time many days from now.”
I, Daniel, was exhausted and sick for days. Then I got up and again carried out the king’s business. But I was astonished at the vision, and there was no one to explain it.
